Job.Description: She will make clothes and other items from fabrics.

LoseTrait.Text: It took her ruining hundreds of pieces of fabric, and just as many reprimands, but ${name} has finally stopped being so Clumsy.

GainTrait.Text: Regular as a tailor has turned ${name} into a capable Handyman.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} worked making and mending clothes at the farm.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to work as a tailor during the ${shift} shift.

Message.Name: repair
Message.Text: She spent some of her time repairing the Farm's equipment instead of making new stuff.
